name: Cycle Back
description:
CYCLE BACK

Cycle back is a 2.5 D puzzle Platformer designed to be entertaining and witty.

The game was made for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 155.
The theme was 'CYCLE'.

Hope you enjoy the game :)

*Fixed some glitches and bugs.

CONTROLS

KEYACTIONArrows Left and Right / A and DRun
Arrow Down / SDrop Down from LedgeSPACEJumpSHIFTPick Up / Drop
